import pandas as pd

# --- Configuration ---
# These are the IDs of the templates in Seal that this script will use
# Replace these with the correct values for your environment.
COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_ID = "bac260ff-7db9-4460-94a2-c3a2c1e5dc4f"
COMPONENT_BALANCE_TEMPLATE_ID = "984ba139-ab1a-47cc-9b4d-52cafcf524ad"
ADDITION_TEMPLATE_ID = "c4dcdd80-bde7-4150-bbd0-0ea833cdb432"

# --- Field Names ---
# These must match the field names in your Seal templates exactly.
PRODUCTION_LIST_SUBMISSION_FIELD_NAME = "Production List"
SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Specification Reference"
TRACKING_CATEGORY_FIELD_NAME = "Tracking Category"
QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME = "Quantity"
COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Component Reference"
ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME = "Output Inventory Additions"
BATCH_ID_FIELD_NAME = "Batch ID"

# Fields in the Addition template
ADDITION_COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Component Reference"
ADDITION_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME = "Quantity"

# Fields in the Component template
COMP_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Specification"
COMP_TRACKING_CATEGORY_FIELD_NAME = "Tracking Category"
COMP_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME = "Initial Quantity"
COMP_ID_FIELD_NAME = "Component ID"

# Fields in the Component Balance template
COMP_BALANCE_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Specification Reference"
COMP_BALANCE_COMP_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME = "Component Reference"
COMP_BALANCE_ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME = "Inventory Additions"


def run_script():
    """
    Main function that processes 'Received Goods' in a containing entity
    and automatically generates:
      - Component entities
      - Inventory Addition entities
      - Component Balance entities
    It also ensures cleanup if something goes wrong.
    """

    # Get the entity where this script is running
    containing_entity = seal.get_containing_entity()

    # Get the change set (group of changes) so all new entities are grouped together
    change_set = seal.get_change_set_for_containing_entity()
    change_set_index = change_set['index']

    if not containing_entity:
        print("Error: This script must be run from within an entity.")
        return

    print(f"Processing containing entity: {containing_entity.get('title', containing_entity['id'])}")

    # Look for the "Production List" field in the containing entity
    production_list_field = containing_entity["fields"].get(PRODUCTION_LIST_SUBMISSION_FIELD_NAME)

    if not production_list_field or not production_list_field.get("value"):
        print(f"No '{PRODUCTION_LIST_SUBMISSION_FIELD_NAME}' found or it is empty in the containing entity.")
        return

    # Will collect references to all Additions for linking later
    created_additions_refs = []

    # Track ALL new entity IDs created so we can delete (archive) them if something fails
    all_created_ids = []

    try:
        # Loop through every item listed in the "Production List" field
        for item_ref in production_list_field["value"]:
            received_item_id = item_ref["id"]

            # Load the full entity for this received item
            received_item_entity = seal.get_entity(entity_id=received_item_id)
            received_item_fields = received_item_entity.get("fields", {})

            # Extract required values
            spec_reference = received_item_fields.get(SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value")
            tracking_category = received_item_fields.get(TRACKING_CATEGORY_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value")[0]
            quantity = received_item_fields.get(QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value")
            comp_id = received_item_fields.get(BATCH_ID_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value")

            # If any required values are missing, stop immediately and rollback everything
            if not all([spec_reference, tracking_category, quantity is not None]):
                raise ValueError(
                    f"Received item {received_item_id} is missing required fields "
                    f"(Specification Reference, Tracking Category, or Quantity)."
                )

            print(f"\n--- Processing received item: {received_item_entity.get('title', received_item_id)} ---")
            print(f"  Tracking Category: {tracking_category}, Quantity: {quantity}")

            # Make the received item editable if itâ€™s not already
            if received_item_entity["status"] != "EDITABLE":
                print(f"  Making received item {received_item_id} editable to update its fields.")
                received_item_entity = seal.make_entity_editable(received_item_id)
                received_item_fields = received_item_entity.get("fields", {})

            # Store new components linked to this received item
            new_component_refs_for_received_item = []

            # --- Case 1: Serialised (create one Component and one Addition per unit) ---
            if tracking_category == "Serialised":
                print(f"  Creating {int(quantity)} serialised components and individual Addition records.")
                for i in range(int(quantity)):
                    # Create Component
                    new_component = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                        template_id=COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_ID,
                        field_values={
                            COMP_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: spec_reference,
                            COMP_TRACKING_CATEGORY_FIELD_NAME: [tracking_category],
                            COMP_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME: 1,
                            COMP_ID_FIELD_NAME: comp_id + "-" + str(i+1)
                        }
                    )
                    component_ref = {"id": new_component["id"], "version": None}
                    new_component_refs_for_received_item.append(component_ref)
                    seal.add_entity_to_change_set(new_component['id'], change_set_index)
                    all_created_ids.append(new_component["id"])

                    # Create Addition (links to Component)
                    addition = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                        template_id=ADDITION_TEMPLATE_ID,
                        field_values={
                            ADDITION_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME: 1,
                            ADDITION_COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: [component_ref]
                        }
                    )
                    addition_ref = {"id": addition["id"], "version": None}
                    created_additions_refs.append(addition_ref)
                    seal.add_entity_to_change_set(addition['id'], change_set_index)
                    all_created_ids.append(addition["id"])

                    # Create Component Balance (links Component + Addition)
                    new_component_balance = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                        template_id=COMPONENT_BALANCE_TEMPLATE_ID,
                        field_values={
                            COMP_BALANCE_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: spec_reference,
                            COMP_BALANCE_COMP_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: [component_ref],
                            COMP_BALANCE_ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME: [addition_ref]
                        }
                    )
                    all_created_ids.append(new_component_balance["id"])
                    # Run any scripts attached to Component Balance template
                    seal.run_embedded_scripts(new_component_balance['id'])

            # --- Case 2: Batch or None (create a single Component + one Addition) ---
            elif tracking_category in ["Batch", "None"]:
                print(f"  Creating 1 component (batch/none) and a single addition record.")

                # Create one Component
                print("  Creating component...")
                new_component = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                        template_id=COMPONENT_TEMPLATE_ID,
                        field_values={
                            COMP_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: spec_reference,
                            COMP_TRACKING_CATEGORY_FIELD_NAME: [tracking_category],
                            COMP_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME: quantity,
                            COMP_ID_FIELD_NAME: comp_id
                        }
                    )
                component_ref = {"id": new_component["id"], "version": None}
                seal.add_entity_to_change_set(new_component['id'], change_set_index)
                new_component_refs_for_received_item.append(component_ref)
                all_created_ids.append(new_component["id"])

                # Create one Addition with total quantity
                print("  Creating Addition...")
                addition = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                    template_id=ADDITION_TEMPLATE_ID,
                    field_values={
                        ADDITION_QUANTITY_FIELD_NAME: quantity,
                        ADDITION_COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: [component_ref]
                    }
                )
                addition_ref = {"id": addition["id"], "version": None}
                created_additions_refs.append(addition_ref)
                seal.add_entity_to_change_set(addition['id'], change_set_index)
                all_created_ids.append(addition["id"])

                # Create Component Balance
                print("  Creating Component Balance...")
                new_component_balance = seal.create_instance_from_template(
                    template_id=COMPONENT_BALANCE_TEMPLATE_ID,
                    field_values={
                        COMP_BALANCE_SPEC_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: spec_reference,
                        COMP_BALANCE_COMP_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME: [component_ref],
                        COMP_BALANCE_ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME: [addition_ref]
                    }
                )
                all_created_ids.append(new_component_balance["id"])
                seal.run_embedded_scripts(new_component_balance['id'])

            # --- Case 3: Unknown category (treat as error) ---
            else:
                raise ValueError(
                    f"Received item {received_item_id} has unknown tracking category '{tracking_category}'."
                )

            # Update the received item with new Component references
            current_component_refs = received_item_fields.get(COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value") or []
            updated_component_refs = current_component_refs + new_component_refs_for_received_item


            print(f"  Updating {COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME} in received item...")

            seal.update_field_value_in_entity(
                entity_id=received_item_id,
                field_name=COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME,
                field_value=updated_component_refs
            )

            print(f"  Updated '{COMPONENT_REFERENCE_FIELD_NAME}' in received item {received_item_id} with {len(new_component_refs_for_received_item)} new references.")

        # --- After all items processed ---
        # Add all Addition references to the containing entity
        current_addition_refs = containing_entity["fields"].get(ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME, {}).get("value") or []
        updated_addition_refs = current_addition_refs + created_additions_refs

        seal.update_field_value_in_entity(
            entity_id=containing_entity['id'],
            field_name=ADDITIONS_FIELD_NAME,
            field_value=updated_addition_refs
        )

        print("\nScript finished successfully.")

    except Exception as e:
        # Any error in the script will roll back by archiving all created entities
        print(f"[ERROR] Script failed: {e}")
        if all_created_ids:
            try:
                print(f"[INFO] Archiving {len(all_created_ids)} entities due to failure...")
                seal.archive_entities(all_created_ids)
            except Exception as archive_err:
                print(f"[WARN] Failed to archive entities: {archive_err}")
        raise  # Re-raise so the error is visible outside this script


# Execute the main function
run_script()
